description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5j14t","text":"Optimized protol to transform the pennate diatom Pseuodo-nitzschia multistriata.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3orm5","text":"absolute EtOH","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ne7b","text":"Pseudo-nitschia multistriata cell culture","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13hbk","text":"F/2 medium (Guillard, 1975)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdllc","text":"agarose","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5r269","text":"100x20 mm Petri dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pv25","text":"Gold microcarriers 0.6 µm diameter (BIORAD)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfuih","text":"CaCl2 2.5M","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":4,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"477m","text":"spermidine 0.1M","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ciefc","text":"DNA plasmids","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dhnq","text":"1550 PSI rupture disks (BIORAD)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi65u","text":"PDS-1000/He stopping screens (BIORAD)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ams24","text":"PDS-1000/He macrocarriers (BIORAD)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv0o5","text":"PDS-1000/He macrocarrier holders","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekrfn","text":"zeocin (InvivoGen)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nkd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ekrrn","text":"Plate 5 x 106 cells of P. multistriata culture in exponential phase (1.5-2 x 105 cells/ml) on 0.4% agarose in F/2 plates. Make a circular cell mat of diameter 4 cm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":79,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":23,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"613ph","text":"Sterilize rapture disks and macrocarriers by soaking for 15 min in 70% EtOH, then allow them to dry in sterile hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e3jj4","text":"Sterilize stopping screens and macrocarrier holders by autoclaving.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"96qsi","text":"Prepare Gold microcarriers as below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ukrc","text":"Place 60 mg of dry gold microcarriers in 1 ml of 100% EtOH in a microcentrifuge tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5iko","text":"Vortex on high speed for 1-2 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be7rg","text":"Repeat 3X.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i0um","text":"Pellet microcarriers in microcentrifuge (1 minute at max speed). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34ssi","text":"Wash 2X in 1 ml of sterile distilled water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cbbd","text":"Suspend in 1 ml of sterile water and aliquot 50 ul into sterile microcentrifuge tubes (vortex continuously while pipetting). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h0ok","text":"Store at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qho3","text":"To 50 ul of the microcarriers in water, add in order, while continuously vortexing: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77bl","text":"3 ul target plasmid (1ug/ul) + 3 ul selection plasmid (1ug/ul) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nvhu","text":"50 ul of CaCl2 2.5M ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gf54","text":"20 ul of spermidine 0.1M","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8i0im","text":"Continue vortexing for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhrs3","text":"Centrifuge for 10 sec at 13000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6k0t","text":"Remove as much supernatant as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tvkh","text":"Wash with 250 ul EtOH 100%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sv03","text":"Spin again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"405va","text":"Centrifuge for 10 sec at max speed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eu5kv","text":"Remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mhh0","text":"Resuspend in 60 ul EtOH 100%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qqth","text":"Leave on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"du9m2","text":"Sterilize rapture disks and macrocarriers by soaking for 15 min in 70% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5htrk","text":"Allow them to dry in sterile hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5btq7","text":"Slowly open the main valve of the helium cylinder until gas pressure registers on the first gauge of the regulator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgbhc","text":"Turn the regulator adjusting screw clockwise to pressure of 1800 psi (200 psi above the burst pressure of the selected rapture disks).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6ip44","text":"Seat macrocarriers into macrocarrier holders.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pqiu","text":"Pipette 10 ul of the prepared microcarriers onto the macrocarrier, while contonuously vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cos2t","text":"Allow drying about 1 minute in hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmef4","text":"Unscrew the assembly containing the rapture disk inside and screw it back on to the acceleration tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5h0d","text":"Gently tighten with torque wrench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fktgq","text":"Remove the microcarrier launch assembly from the sample chamber and do the following: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am09o","text":"remove the lid, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bshdk","text":"adjust the spacer rings, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"530un","text":"put a sterile stopping screen in place, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k7dt","text":"install the macrocarrier holder (with dried DNA-coated particles facing down), ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbl1h","text":"put the lid back on and place the whole assembly in the second shelf slot in the chamber,","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"606mq","text":"place the Petri dish containing the sample on the third shelf slot, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chtem","text":"close the bombardment chamber door.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctuam","text":"With the power on, start the vacuum pump and turn the central switch to hold. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r91o","text":"Press the fire switch continuously until the rapture disk bursts and the helium pressure gauge drops to zero. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc74","text":"Turn the central gauge to vent to release the vacuum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfgnt","text":"Open the bombardment chamber door and remove the plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4etff","text":"Unload the macrocarrier and stopping screen from the macrocarrier launch assembly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dvtm","text":"Unload the spent rapture disk.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"768aa","text":"After all shots, close the main valve and shoot until bottle pressure goes to zero.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bveh1","text":"Keep the cells at 18°C in light-dark cycle (12h-12h).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b26b3","text":"After almost 4/5 hours, detach cells from the solid medium by adding 5 ml of F/2 liquid medium without selection and gently pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaelf","text":"Transfer on flasks in a total volum of 200 ml of medium without selection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9f8n1","text":"After 24 h add zeocin 1ug/ml to flasks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91p7e","text":"The transgenic cells will be resistant to antibiotic and will be visible in 2 or 3 weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Biolistic transformation of Pseudo-nitzschia multistriata
